DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect qigong intervention program telomerase activity Chinese woman history intimate partner violence .
DOC.brief_title: Qigong Intervention Program Abused Chinese Women
DOC.detailed_description: Qigong mind-body exercise root paradigm traditional Chinese medicine , aim achieve harmonious flow energy ( qi ) body gentle movement thus consider holistic health practice towards promote physical mental well-being improve longevity . It suggest qigong exercise , stress management strategy , could effective improve psychological symptom , well enhance cellular telomerase activity reduce oxidative stress level regulate immune response . The study evaluate effect qigong intervention telomerase activity pro-inflammation cytokine , perceive stress , perceive coping , depressive symptom Chinese woman history intimate partner violence . The study design randomize , wait-list control design intervention wait-list control group . A total 240 Chinese abuse woman recruit . The qigong intervention program consist : ( ) 2-hr group qigong training twice week 6 week ; ( ii ) weekly group follow-up 1-hour group qigong exercise 4 month ; ( iii ) self-practice qigong exercise 30 minute day throughout intervention period last 5.5 month . It hypothesize participant intervention group high level telomerase activity perceive coping , low level pro-inflammation cytokine , perceive stress , depressive symptom , completion qigong intervention program , compare abused Chinese woman wait-list control group .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old , willing undertake qigong intervention program , available test point , receptive random allocation , assess abused intimate partner precede year longer , base Chinese Abuse Assessment Screen . participate qigong training mind body intervention within previous 6 month , serious medical condition might limit participation qigong exercise ( base previous experience , condition include cancer , severe obesity , narcolepsy , major depressive disorder , schizophrenia ) , psychiatric disorder , use medication psychological intervention stress , abuse someone intimate partner .
